mapper.select: select rnum, notice_No as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_views as noticeViews from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from (select * from notice order by notice_No desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select notice_No as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_views as noticeViews from notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_Views = notice_views+1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
